item.title: Let's Encrypt - Has a certificate problem in Android Chrome
item.description: Let’s Encrypt - Has a certificate problem in Android Chrome If you use Let’s Encrypt as SSL certificate Then setting this in Nginx ssl_certificate /etc/letsencrypt/live/<domain>/cert.pem; You can find it maybe has problem in Android Chrome Now you can modify this ssl_certificate /etc/letsencrypt/live/<domain>/fullchain.pem; Test your SSL SSL Server Test Refer - Let’s encrypt certificate not working for Andriod’s Google Chrome
